thread.title: Rosa Linda's Mexican Cafe Saying Goodbye: Thanks for Three Great Decades
thread.title_full: Rosa Linda's Mexican Cafe Saying Goodbye: Thanks for Three Great Decades | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Rosa Linda's Mexican Cafe Saying Goodbye: Thanks for Three Great Decades
text:
Photo by Alexis Johnson Denver blog posts have a healthy respect for good Mexican food.
Related Stories The Zombie Doesn't Fall Far From the Tree on Denver's 16th Street Mall At our Food & Drink blog, Patricia Calhoun reveals the impending closure of Rosa Linda's Mexican Cafe after just over thirty years.
Denver Infill's Ryan Dravitz shares part one of the page's final 1601 Wewatta Project update .
Did you know George W. Bush visited Denver on Sunday evening, October 18? Big Media's Jason Salzman thinks we should have heard more about it.
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
